Foley |established_title = Incorporated |established_date = 1846 |area_magnitude = |unit_pref = Imperial |area_footnotes = |area_total_km2 = 1.55 |area_land_km2 = 1.54 |area_water_km2 = 0.01 |area_total_sq_mi = 0.60 |area_land_sq_mi = 0.59 |area_water_sq_mi = 0.01 |area_water_percent = 0.91 |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = |elevation_ft = 108 |population_as_of = 2020 |population_footnotes = |population_note = |population_total = 1986 |population_est = |pop_est_as_of = |population_density_km2 = auto |population_density_sq_mi = auto |timezone1 = |utc_offset1 = |timezone1_DST = |utc_offset1_DST = |coordinates = |postal_code_type = |postal_code = 10516 |area_code = 845 |blank_name = FIPS code |blank_info = 36-16936 |website = |footnotes = |pop_est_footnotes = }} Cold Spring is a village in the town of Philipstown in Putnam County, New York, United States. 1,986 people lived there at the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Villages in New York (state)
